text:
Its nice to have a Task that can genarate certificates like JKS and P12.

While Signing the 'Jars' and making 'deployments builds for webapps with https'
we need to have a certificate, If it is generated by an Ant task on the fly by
taking the required arguments it will be more easy for build process.

Consider this as an Enhancement in the future releases.
